title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.42 - Requests from the bureau of labor statistics for data
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 801.42 - Requests from the bureau of labor statistics for data

State Regulations
(a) If the employer receives a survey of
occupational injuries and illnesses form from the Bureau of Labor Statistics
(BLS), or a BLS designee, the employer must promptly complete the form and
return it following the instructions contained on the survey form. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
801.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
